Package csw.services.cs.akka

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ConfigServiceActor.ConfigServiceRequest
    Base trait of messages received by this actor
    ConfigServiceActor.ConfigServiceResult
    Reply messages (The final arguments, wrapped in Try[], give the actual results of a message request)
    ConfigServiceJsonFormats
    Defines JSON marshallers/unmarshallers for the objects used in HTTP/REST messages.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BlockingConfigServiceClient  
    BlockingConfigServiceClient$
    A blocking wrapper for a ConfigServiceClient.
    ConfigService
    Config Service standalone application.
    ConfigService.Options  
    ConfigService.Options$  
    ConfigService.Terminator
    Exits the application when the given actor stops
    ConfigService$
    Config Service standalone application.
    ConfigServiceActor
    An Akka actor class implementing the Config Service.
    ConfigServiceActor.CreateOrUpdateRequest
    Message to create the file if it does not exist, otherwise update it.
    ConfigServiceActor.CreateOrUpdateRequest$  
    ConfigServiceActor.CreateOrUpdateResult
    Reply to a create or update message param: path relative path to file in repo param: configId the id of the file, if successful
    ConfigServiceActor.CreateOrUpdateResult$  
    ConfigServiceActor.CreateRequest
    Message to create a new file in the repository.
    ConfigServiceActor.CreateRequest$  
    ConfigServiceActor.DeleteRequest
    Message to delete the file in the repo.
    ConfigServiceActor.DeleteRequest$  
    ConfigServiceActor.ExistsRequest
    Message to check if the file exists in the repo.
    ConfigServiceActor.ExistsRequest$  
    ConfigServiceActor.ExistsResult
    Reply to an ConfigServiceActor.ExistsRequest message param: path relative path to file in repo param: exists true if there were no errors and the path exists in the repo
    ConfigServiceActor.ExistsResult$  
    ConfigServiceActor.GetDefaultRequest
    Gets the default version of the file.
    ConfigServiceActor.GetDefaultRequest$  
    ConfigServiceActor.GetRequest
    Message to get the contents of a file from the repository.
    ConfigServiceActor.GetRequest$  
    ConfigServiceActor.GetResult
    Reply to a ConfigServiceActor.GetRequest param: path relative path to file in repo param: id optional id of the file version param: configData holds the file's data
    ConfigServiceActor.GetResult$  
    ConfigServiceActor.HistoryRequest
    Message to get the file history.
    ConfigServiceActor.HistoryRequest$  
    ConfigServiceActor.HistoryResult
    Reply to a ConfigServiceActor.HistoryRequest param: path relative path to file in repo param: history lists the file's history
    ConfigServiceActor.HistoryResult$  
    ConfigServiceActor.ListRequest$
    Message to list all the files in the repo.
    ConfigServiceActor.ListResult
    Reply to a ListRequest param: list lists the files in the repo
    ConfigServiceActor.ListResult$  
    ConfigServiceActor.ResetDefaultRequest
    Resets the default to be the newest file version.
    ConfigServiceActor.ResetDefaultRequest$  
    ConfigServiceActor.SetDefaultRequest
    Sets the "default" file version.
    ConfigServiceActor.SetDefaultRequest$  
    ConfigServiceActor.UnitResult
    Reply message for operations that don't return a value (ConfigServiceActor.DeleteRequest, ConfigServiceActor.SetDefaultRequest, ConfigServiceActor.ResetDefaultRequest) param: path relative path to file in repo param: status indicates if the operation was successful
    ConfigServiceActor.UnitResult$  
    ConfigServiceActor.UpdateRequest
    Message to update the file.
    ConfigServiceActor.UpdateRequest$  
    ConfigServiceActor$
    Config service actor.
    ConfigServiceClient  
    ConfigServiceClient$  
    ConfigServiceHttpClient  
    ConfigServiceHttpClient$  
    ConfigServiceHttpServer  
    ConfigServiceHttpServer$  
    ConfigServiceJsonFormats.ConfigFileHistoryJsonFormat
    ConfigFileHistory JSON support
    ConfigServiceJsonFormats.ConfigFileInfoJsonFormat
    ConfigFileInfo JSON support
    ConfigServiceJsonFormats.ConfigIdJsonFormat
    ConfigId JSON support
    ConfigServiceSettings  
    ConfigServiceSettings$
    Config Service settings based on the Akka reference.conf file (under resources in this module)
